components/common/polyfill-script:
<script>
    {{!--
        Check for modern browser features, and load polyfills if browser does not appear to support features
        we need.

            Polyfill approach is all or nothing - please import needed polyfills in /assets/js/polyfills.js

        Inspired by https://philipwalton.com/articles/loading-polyfills-only-when-needed/
            --}}
    function browserSupportsAllFeatures() {
        return window.Promise
            && window.fetch
            && window.URL
            && window.URLSearchParams
            && window.WeakMap
            // object-fit support
            && ('objectFit' in document.documentElement.style);
    }

    function loadScript(src) {
        var js = document.createElement('script');
        js.src = src;
        js.onerror = function () {
            console.error('Failed to load polyfill script ' + src);
        };
        document.head.appendChild(js);
    }

    if (!browserSupportsAllFeatures()) {
        loadScript('{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.polyfills.js'}}');
    }
</script>
components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}

            <script type="text/javascript">
                const faders = document.querySelectorAll(".fade-in");
                const sliders = document.querySelectorAll(".slide-in");

                const appearOptions = {
                  threshold: 0,
                  rootMargin: "0px 0px -250px 0px"
                };

                const appearOnScroll = new IntersectionObserver(function(
                  entries,
                  appearOnScroll
                ) {
                  entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (!entry.isIntersecting) {
                      return;
                    } else {
                      entry.target.classList.add("appear");
                      appearOnScroll.unobserve(entry.target);
                    }
                  });
                },
                appearOptions);

                faders.forEach(fader => {
                  appearOnScroll.observe(fader);
                });

                sliders.forEach(slider => {
                  appearOnScroll.observe(slider);
                });

                $('#toggle_icon').toggle(function() {
                $('#toggle_icon').text('-');
                $('#toggle_text').slideToggle();

                }, function() {

                $('#toggle_icon').text('+');
                $('#toggle_text').slideToggle();

                });

            </script>
 
            
            <script type="text/javascript">
            //   window.onscroll = function() { myFunction() };

            //   var header = document.getElementById("myHeader");
            //   var sticky = header.offsetTop;

            //   function myFunction() {
            //     if (window.pageYOffset > sticky) {
            //       header.classList.add("sticky");
            //     } else {
            //       header.classList.remove("sticky");
            //     }
            //   }

              $('.variable-width').slick({
              dots: true,
              infinite: true,
              speed: 300,
              slidesToShow: 1,
              centerMode: true,
              variableWidth: true,
              arrows: true
            });
                
          </script>
        
        <script>
              var lastScrollTop = 0;
              window.addEventListener("scroll", function(){ 
              var st = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop; 
              var navPage = document.getElementsByClassName("header-div");
               var navSticky = document.getElementsByClassName("navigation-sticky");
              if(st==0){
                  for (let i = 0; i < navPage.length; i++) {
                      const div = navPage[i];
                      div.classList.remove("sticky");
                  }
                   for (let i = 0; i < navSticky.length; i++) {
                      const div = navSticky[i];
                      div.classList.remove("head-stick");
                      div.classList.add("d-block");
                  }
              }else{

                  for (let i = 0; i < navPage.length; i++) {
                      const div = navPage[i];
                      div.classList.add("sticky");
                  }
                  for (let i = 0; i < navSticky.length; i++) {
                      const div = navSticky[i];
                      div.classList.add("head-stick");
                      div.classList.add("d-block");
                  }
              }

              lastScrollTop = st <= 0 ? 0 : st; // For Mobile or negative scrolling
              }, false);
        </script>

          <script>
            $(document).ready(function(){
                  $('.truth-container-slick').slick({
                    pauseOnHover: true,
                    autoplay: false,
                    autoplayspeed: 2000,
                    speed: 1000,
                    centerMode: true,
                    centerPadding: '20%',
                    slidesToShow: 1,
                    slidesToScroll: 1,
                    draggable:true,
                    dots: true,
                    responsive: [{
                      breakpoint: 991,
                      settings: {
                        slidesToShow: 1,
                      },
                      
                      breakpoint: 667,
                      settings:{
                        slidesToShow: 1,
                        centerMode: false
                      }
                    }]
                    
                  });

                  $('.navigation-slick').slick({
                    slide: 'li',
                    pauseOnHover: true,
                    autoplay: false,
                    autoplayspeed: 2000,
                    speed: 1000,
                    slidesToShow: 2,
                    slidesToScroll: 2,
                    draggable:true,
                    variableWidth: true,
                    dots: false,
                    infinite: false,
                    responsive: [{
                      breakpoint: 1000,
                      settings: {
                        slidesToShow: 1,
                        slidesToScroll: 1
                      }
                    }]
                    
                  });
                });
          </script>
          <script>
                $(document).ready(function(){
                    var slick_option = {
                        "dots": false,
                        "mobileFirst": true,
                        "slidesToShow": 3,
                        "slidesToScroll": 3,
                        "autoplay": false,
                    "infinite": false
                    };

                  $('.gg').each(function(){
                    $(this).not('.slick-initialized').slick(slick_option);
                  });

                    $('.navPages-action.has-subMenu').on('hover click mousemove' , function(){
                      var _slickContainer = $(this).parent().find('.gg');
                      if( _slickContainer.length > 0){
                            _slickContainer[0].slick.refresh();	 
                      }
                    });

                    $(window).on('resize orientationchange', function() {
                        $('.gg').slick('resize');
                    });

                });
        </script>
        
        <style>
            li.navPage-subMenu-item a {
                padding-bottom: 0 !important;
            }
        </style>

        <script>
          jQuery('#navPages-29 li:nth-child(2)').addClass("child-active");
          jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.child-active .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").css({"display":"block","left":"0", "background":"#fff","top":"0"});

            jQuery("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item").on('mouseover', function() {
                // Hover Class Added
                jQuery("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item").removeClass('child-active');
                jQuery(this).addClass('child-active');    
                $("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item .navPage-subMenu._nav-open-flag").removeClass("dropdown-open");
                $("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item.child-active .navPage-subMenu._nav-open-flag").addClass("dropdown-open");
                $("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item.child-active > a > .navPages-action-moreIcon").removeClass("unset-transform");
                // $(".navPage-subMenu>*").removeClass("slideUp");

                // $(".dropdown-open").removeClass("d-none p-0").css({'cssText':'padding: 0.5rem 1.5rem 0.5rem !important;', 'height': 'auto'});
                $(".dropdown-open").removeClass("d-none p-0").css({'cssText':'padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 0rem!important;', 'display': 'block !important', 'height': 'auto'});
                $(".dropdown-open>*").removeClass("d-none");
                $("ul.navPage-subMenu-list.bed-nav").css({'cssText': 'display: block!important','margin-top': '0 !important'});
              });


            jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child").on('mouseover', function() {
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-parent").removeClass('child-active');
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child").removeClass('child-active');
                jQuery(this).addClass('child-active');  
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").removeAttr("style");
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.child-active .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").css({"display":"block","top":"0","left":"0","background":"#fff"});
                
                // jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.custom-first.child-active .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").css({"display":"block","top":"0","left":"0","background":"#fff"});
            });
            
            jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child").on('mouseout', function() {
              jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.custom-first").removeClass('child-active');  
              jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.child-active .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").addClass("out-event");
              
              // jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child").mouseover(function(){$(this).stop()})
              // jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-parent").addClass('child-active');
              // jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").removeAttr("style");
              // jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.default .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").removeAttr("style");
              // jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.custom-first.child-active .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").css({"display":"block","top":"0","left":"0","background":"#fff"});
            });
            jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-parent").on('mouseover', function() {
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child").removeClass('child-active');
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-parent").removeClass('child-active');
                jQuery(this).addClass('child-active');  
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.custom-first").addClass('child-active');  
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").removeAttr("style");
                jQuery(".navPage-subMenu-item-child.custom-first.child-active .custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").css({"display":"block","top":"0","left":"0","background":"#fff"});
            });

            $("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item.child-active .navPage-subMenu._nav-open-flag").on('mouseout', function() {
                // jQuery(this).addClass('d-none');
            });
        </script>  
          
          
        <script>
                $(document).ready(function(){
                    var slick_option = {
                        "dots": false,
                        "mobileFirst": true,
                        "slidesToShow": 2,
                        "slidesToScroll": 2,
                        "autoplay": false,
                    "infinite": false
                    };

                  $('.slide-navv').each(function(){
                    $(this).not('.slick-initialized').slick(slick_option);
                  });

                    $('.navPage-subMenu-action.navPages-action.navPages-action-depth-max.has-subMenu').on('hover click mousemove' , function(){
                      var _slickContainer = $(this).parent().find('.slide-navv');
                      if( _slickContainer.length > 0){
                            _slickContainer[0].slick.refresh();	 
                      }
                    });

                    $(window).on('resize orientationchange', function() {
                        $('.slide-navv').slick('resize');
                    });

                });
        </script>

        <script>
          $(document).ready(function(){
            $("main.body > *, footer").mouseover(function() {
              // $("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item .navPage-subMenu._nav-open-flag").removeClass("dropdown-open").hide(2000);
              $("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item.child-active > a > .navPages-action-moreIcon").addClass("unset-transform");
              jQuery("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item").removeClass('child-active');
              $(".dropdown-open").addClass("d-none p-0").css({'cssText':'padding: 0!important', 'display': 'none !important', 'height': '0'});
              $(".dropdown-open>*").addClass("d-none")
              $("ul.navPage-subMenu-list.bed-nav").css('cssText', 'display: none!important');
              // $(".navPage-subMenu>*, #navPages-custom").addClass("slideUp");
              // $(".navPage-subMenu").hide(2000);
              // $("li.navPage-subMenu-item-child.default").removeClass("child-active");
              // $("li.navPage-subMenu-item-child.custom-first").addClass("child-active");
              // $("div#navPages-custom").addClass("d-block");
              // $(".custom-bed-nav > .navPage-subMenu").addClass("d-none");
              // $("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item.child-active > a > .navPages-action-moreIcon").css("transform","unset");
              // $("#menu .navPages ul.navPages-list > li.navPages-item.child-active > a > .navPages-action-moreIcon").css("transform","rotate(-180deg)");

            });
            
            $(".navPages-item-page").mouseout(function() {
              $(".navPages-item-page").removeClass("child-active");
            });
          });  
        </script>

        <script>
            var element = document.getElementsByClassName("body");
            for (let i = 0; i < element.length; i++) {
                      const div = element[i];
                      var topPosition = div.offsetTop
                      // console.log(topPosition);
                      
                   if(topPosition < "150" ){
                          jQuery(".navigation-sticky").addClass("d-block");
                          // console.log("less than 150");
                    }
                    //   }else{
                    //     jQuery(".header-div").addClass("sticky");  
                    //      jQuery(".navigation-sticky").css("top","95px");
                    //      console.log("more than 148");
                    //   }
            }
        </script>
          <script type="text/javascript">
                  AOS.init();
          </script>

                  if(account_Page == 'Your Account'){
                      $('.body').addClass('accountPage');

              });

        {{{footer.scripts}}}
    </body>
